scene_description_enriched: A female saint, identified by her halo and palm frond, stands in a verdant landscape. She is dressed in a blue undergarment and a reddish-brown cloak lined with green, holding a red book with gold clasps. The background depicts rolling hills, scattered trees, and a distant view of a white building with golden spires, possibly a church or castle, under a blue sky with stylized stars. The scene is framed by an ornate, gilded arch decorated with floral motifs.
